name: "THE TREE OF LIFE"
description: Never Too Young's Logo T- Shirt.

name: "INSPIRE"
description:
"The bandwagon effect is a well documented form of groupthink in behavioral science and has many applications. The general rule is that conduct or beliefs spread among people, as fads and trends clearly do, with the probability of any individual ADOPTING it increasing with the proportion who have already done so."

    Recently, the jersey-influenced t-shirt became a hit with so many different clothing brands; major and also up and coming. Therefore, we at Never Too Young decided to "join the bandwagon." Instead of putting a catchy word on the back of our tee, we decided to follow our platform, and "INSPIRE" was the perfect word that came to mind. 

INSPIRE - 
1. Fill (someone) with the urge or ability to do or feel something.
2. Create (a feeling, esp. a positive one) in a person

    NTY believes that you are NEVER TOO YOUNG to impact someone's life positively, and also negatively. That belief inspired the double zero (00) on the back of our tee.

    Our wish is that people take our tee shirt and manifest inspiration into the world because of "the bandwagon effect."

NeverTooYoung2012@gmail.com
